name: Side Bends on Machine
how_to_perform:
1. Sit on the side bend machine with your back facing a pad and your legs secured under the footrest.
2. Place your hands on the armrests for support.
3. Press gently against the footrest to adjust it so that your knees are slightly bend at an angle of around 90 degrees.
4. Engage your core by maintaining good posture.
5. Slowly press your body sideways away from the machine, keeping your legs straight and in a stationary position.
6. Keep your back flat against the pad throughout the movement.
7. Hold the contraction for a brief moment to emphasize activation in your muscles.
8. Pause briefly at the top of the exercise.
9. Return slowly and smoothly to the starting position.
10. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
short_summary: Side bends on machine are an isolation exercise that specifically targets the abs and can be performed while seated facing away from a pad.
